sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: Neither letters nor papers, for the Railwaymen had gone on strike at midnight

Meanwhile, I proceed with the poor little cycle of unreal duties – Harvest Festivals, Dedications of War Memorials &c – as if anybody really felt the smallest interest in any of them. I wrote to

She is a most courageous person, as well as very brilliant; &, if her health does not give way, she will yet astonish the world. Her description of Italian feeling with respect to D'Annunzio's raid on Fiume is illuminating – "
